trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of ConfigurationLocationCollection objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含 ConfigurationLocationCollection 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationLocationCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects, which represent the resources for which location-specific configuration settings are defined.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ConfigurationLocationCollection 類別逐一查看集合的<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>物件，代表特定位置的組態設定會定義的資源。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>

trans-unit.source: ConfigurationLocationCollection is the type returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.

> [!NOTE] > The ConfigurationLocationCollection class might not reference the collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects in the order that they are specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ConfigurationLocationCollection 類別可能會不參考的集合<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>它們在組態檔中指定的順序中的物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"></xref>指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Item accessor to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to get a specific <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> object from the collection by specifying its index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用的項目存取子<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection>方法來取得特定<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>藉由指定集合內其索引集合中的物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index location of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"></xref> to return.
